thread.section_title: Biz2Credit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biz2Credit | biz2credit.com
thread.title: MOferry

author: MOferry
title: MOferry
text: The whole process took less than a week. We had tried other companies and jumped through all of their hoops only to find out that since we didn't have $10k in our account, we couldn't borrow $10k. How's that for irony? Dominique stayed in constant contact with us through the process and on the 4th business day, we had our loan money in our account! Now we have the capital needed to breathe while we grow. Thanks, Dominque!
